home_hero_subtitle: Connect with local artisan bakers and create the perfect cake for your special moments. From custom designs to ready-made delights, we bring sweetness to your celebrations.
home_constructor_subtitle: Use our interactive cake constructor to design the perfect cake for your special occasion. Choose flavors, decorations, and personalize every detail with our talented bakers.
home_about_subtitle: We are passionate about connecting cake lovers with talented local bakers. Our platform brings together creativity, quality, and convenience to make every celebration sweeter and more memorable.
home_why_choose_subtitle: We connect you with passionate local bakers who create exceptional custom cakes and baked goods
home_feature_expert_bakers_subtitle: Skilled artisan bakers with years of experience and passion for their craft, ensuring every cake is a masterpiece
home_feature_custom_designs_subtitle: Create unique cakes tailored to your vision with our interactive cake builder and personalization options
home_feature_real_time_tracking_subtitle: Follow your order from preparation to completion with live progress updates and delivery notifications
home_feature_community_focused_subtitle: Supporting local businesses while bringing communities together through the joy of exceptional baked goods
home_feature_quality_guaranteed_subtitle: Every baker on our platform is vetted for quality, reliability, and commitment to using premium ingredients
home_feature_competitive_pricing_subtitl: Fair, transparent pricing with no hidden fees, plus special offers and loyalty rewards for regular customers
bakers_page_no_bakers: No bakers found matching your criteria.
custom_page_requests_placeholder: Any special requests or dietary requirements...
custom_page_preparation_time: Custom cakes require 3-7 days preparation time
custom_page_error_login: Please log in to add items to your cart.
custom_page_error_add_to_cart: Failed to add to cart. Please try again.
contact_page_subtitle: Have questions about our cakes or need a custom design? We'd love to hear from you!
contact_page_faq_q1: How can I place an order?
contact_page_faq_a1: You can place an order directly through our website by adding items to your cart and proceeding to checkout. We also accept phone orders during business hours.
contact_page_faq_q2: Do you offer custom cake designs?
contact_page_faq_a2: Yes, we specialize in custom cake designs! Please use the contact form below to discuss your requirements with our design team. We recommend placing custom orders at least 3-5 days in advance.
contact_page_faq_a3: We offer local delivery within a 20-mile radius of our bakery. Delivery fees start at 50000 UZS and vary based on distance. We also provide pickup options if you prefer to collect your order.
contact_page_faq_q4: How far in advance should I order?
contact_page_faq_a4: For regular cakes from our menu, we recommend ordering at least 24 hours in advance. For custom designs and special occasions, please allow 3-5 days notice to ensure we can create exactly what you envision.
contact_page_faq_a5: Absolutely! We offer gluten-free, sugar-free, vegan, and other dietary-friendly options. Please mention your specific requirements when placing your order so we can ensure your cake meets your needs.
contact_page_send_message_success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
contact_page_message_placeholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...
cart_page_empty_cart_subtitle: Start building your perfect cake or browse our ready-made options
checkout_special_instructions_placeholde: Any special instructions for your order?
my_orders_will_display_here: Your orders will be displayed here.
my_orders_confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this order? This action cannot be undone.
help_page_baker_resources_subtitle: Tools and guides to help you succeed as a baker on our platform
help_page_no_faq: No FAQ items found matching your search.
help_page_terms_of_service_text: By using our service, you agree to these terms and conditions. Please read them carefully.
help_page_privacy_policy_text: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect and use your information.
help_page_refund_policy_text_1: We offer full refunds for cancelled orders within 24 hours of placement.
help_page_refund_policy_text_2: For custom orders, refunds are available only if the order hasn't entered production phase.
help_page_terms_lorem: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
help_page_privacy_lorem: Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
faq_question_reset_password: How do I reset my password?
faq_answer_reset_password: You can reset your password by clicking on the 'Forgot Password' link on the login page and following the instructions.
faq_question_track_order: How can I track my order?
faq_answer_track_order: Once your order is shipped, you will receive an email with a tracking number and a link to track your package.
faq_question_payment_methods: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_answer_payment_methods: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay.
faq_question_change_cancel_order: Can I change or cancel my order?
faq_answer_change_cancel_order: Order changes or cancellations are possible within 24 hours of placement. Please contact our support team immediately.
faq_answer_international_shipping: Currently, we only ship within the country. We are working on expanding our shipping options soon.
contact_faq_question_place_order: How can I place an order?
contact_faq_answer_place_order: You can place an order directly through our website by adding items to your cart and proceeding to checkout. We also accept phone orders during business hours.
contact_faq_question_custom_designs: Do you offer custom cake designs?
contact_faq_answer_custom_designs: Yes, we specialize in custom cake designs! Please use the contact form below to discuss your requirements with our design team. We recommend placing custom orders at least 3-5 days in advance.
contact_faq_answer_delivery_options: We offer local delivery within a 20-mile radius of our bakery. Delivery fees start at 50000 UZS and vary based on distance. We also provide pickup options if you prefer to collect your order.
contact_faq_question_advance_order: How far in advance should I order?
contact_faq_answer_advance_order: For regular cakes from our menu, we recommend ordering at least 24 hours in advance. For custom designs and special occasions, please allow 3-5 days notice to ensure we can create exactly what you envision.
contact_faq_answer_dietary_restrictions: Absolutely! We offer gluten-free, sugar-free, vegan, and other dietary-friendly options. Please mention your specific requirements when placing your order so we can ensure your cake meets your needs.
